articles.title: Paytm Bank Fined Over Rs 5 Crore For Violations Under Money Laundering Act - NDTV
articles.description: Paytm Payments Bank has been fined Rs 5.49 crore over alleged money laundering in the latest setback to the fintech, a month after the Reserved Bank of India (RBI) ordered it to stop accepting any fresh deposits in its accounts or wallets.
